post.body: u sick, k??
yea,yea! good luck - fingers crossed! :D
but thats just my humble opinion. and yes, i AM very opinionated. :D
the only thing they do is crush the little guy & uglify small cities (like barrie) with their big corporational ugliness.
went 2 the evil dreaded wal-mart 2day. hell on earth, disguised in tinsil & ribbon & bow, that store is. chain stores all suck...
and 2 top it off: ADD. my attention span is just so ..... hey, look it's snowing!
i also have a rare case of CRS (Cant Remember Shit) , which is actually quite common in the family...
i'm mathematically dyslexic. according to statistics, 100 out of every 50 people suffer from this painful disease....
its like pre-school all over again, so brace yourselves, canada. this is gonna get interesting.
other AND SHARE!
....TIME OUT!! Harper, go sit in the corner. Dion, ur in the other 1. and i don't want either of u 2 move until u can play nicely with each
(harper runs 2 the gverner gnrl) governer general: now, now u 2. try & get along. Harper& Dion: BUT HE - governer general: THAT'S IT ....
...i don't have to share at all bcuz im a pompous ass. (points at dion) and i'm gonna 2 tell on u mr smarty pants bcuz u are bugging me!
... i can do anything i want becuz I am leader. not you, not that guy over there. me. me me me me me. ME!
Harper: (smugly) because I got the MOST votes. i am SMARTER than you, Dion. Live with it. in fact, i am better than everybody. look at ME!
Dion: it's not FAIR! I want MY turn! y does HE (points at harper) get 2 lead? he is no better than i. *pouts, looking daggers at harper*
listening 2 ozzy's crazy train. devil music at its finest. seija's deeply concerned ...
vista sucks. pass it on ...
"in this life u expect some trouble, but wen u worry u make it double" ~ (cant rmbr where i herd this 1 ...)
began "ABV" (anething but vista) campaign on acer. complained bitterly in hopes of free XP CD. another hydrant day indeed. wat next?
vista is a large piece of poo. it questions everything u do nd makes computer run slow. many glitches.
when my ship comes in, i'll probably be at the airport...
... but i didnt bcuz wen i do i always feel guilty afterwards. cursed catholic conscience....
now, there are many nasty smartass comments i could've shot back atter...
yeah, she said, and i quote, "i hope u 2 are related, or do you just not have anything better to do with your time."
some low-life sleezeball checkout chic at zehrs gave me proper hell 4 packing my own grandmother's groceries. bi-otch!
...whut? 2 much 2 ask 4? crap, i no... back to friggin reality. messy house. no yard. living in fucken subdivision in city. save me. please.
now, thats my idea of christmas. a place to play hockey. let the dog out. bring the family up. not a care in the world...
wishing i were up north sumwhere in a lovely decorated cottage backing onto a bush & overlooking a glassy frozen lake 4 christmas...
*snorts* bah humbug. christmas HERE gets less and less appealing with every passing year.
santa's making his list & checking it twice, gonna find out who's naughty or nice. ... i'm toast.
